# Gas Law
- combination of Boyle's Law and Charles' Law
- $$\frac{P_{1}V_{1}}{T_{1}}= \frac{P_{2}V_{2}}{T_{2}}$$
- Temp must be in Kelvin
- pressure x volume of a gas = number of moles x molar gas constant x absolute temperature
- $$pV = nRT$$
